interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Caterpillar "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the Maid Cafe at night

progression.synopsis: Sensei visits the maid cafe for the first time since Uta moved into his class. He still has no resistance to her tactics, and they talk a bit about the nature of her job. Uta points out that Sensei would get in trouble with the school for being there, and he informs her that thanks to the school's policy on students having jobs, so would she. They agree to keep each other's secret. Afterwards, Sensei walks Uta back to the dorm, since she's still a bit new to the area.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.12p2.
